books.author: by Michael Pollan
books.description: A personal account of how psychedelics might help the mentally ill and people dealing with everyday challenges.
books.name: HOW TO CHANGE YOUR MIND

books.author: by Jon Meacham
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning biographer contextualizes the present political climate through the lens of difficult moments in American history.
books.name: THE SOUL OF AMERICA

books.author: by James Comey
books.description: The former F.B.I. director recounts cases and personal events that shaped his outlook on justice, and analyzes the leadership styles of three presidents.
books.name: A HIGHER LOYALTY

books.author: by Zora Neale Hurston
books.description: A previously unpublished, first-person account of Cudjo Lewis, a man who was transported and enslaved 50 years after the slave trade was banned.
books.name: BARRACOON

books.author: by Bret Baier and Catherine Whitney
books.description: The Fox News anchor describes Ronald Reagan’s 1988 visit to the Soviet capital.
books.name: THREE DAYS IN MOSCOW

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species.
books.name: SAPIENS

books.author: by Michelle McNamara
books.description: The late true-crime journalist's search for the serial murderer and rapist known as "the Golden State Killer."
books.name: I'LL BE GONE IN THE DARK

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by Dave Itzkoff
books.description: A New York Times journalist details the career and struggles of the actor and comedian Robin Williams.
books.name: ROBIN

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: by J.D. Vance
books.description: A Yale Law School graduate looks at the struggles of the white working class through the story of his own childhood.
books.name: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: by John Doerr
books.description: How a goal-setting system helped large tech companies succeed.
books.name: MEASURE WHAT MATTERS

books.author: by Ken Langone
books.description: A memoir by a co-founder of Home Depot and a former director of the New York Stock Exchange.
books.name: I LOVE CAPITALISM!

books.author: by Ronan Farrow
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist chronicles the deterioration of American diplomacy.
books.name: WAR ON PEACE

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the laws that govern the universe.
books.name: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY
